column2: In part 4 of this activity, you'll get the sources, so you can compare them against your own efforts!
Hey, {{user_name}}! I hope you had fun making your low-poly well in the previous 3 sections of the activity.
I've sent all the source files for this activity to your home directory, under /BlenderSources/LowPolyWell. You can open them up in Blender and see exactly how close you got!
Your 3d modeling portfolio keeps growing all the time, and I can't wait to give you even more new activities. See you next time!
